title: Mastery tokens
body: So i was playing a game as corki trying to get my level 6 mastery tokens and once the game finished i received an s- but not mastery token did something happen that i did to make me not achieve it or did something happen in the system. (unfortunately I did not save the end game screen)

replies.body: What game mode were you playing? The mastery tokens can only be earned while playing normal and ranked SR matches. You cannot earn them while playing ARAM, TT, or any of the rotating game modes.

Zombiemaster gave some great info here. A lot of this, and more info can be found on the [Champion Mastery guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide)

If you find that you were playing a match on Summoner's Rift when you earned this rank S-, grab the match link from the match history section of the site. You can then take that link and include it [in a ticket submission](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our game specialists can assist you further. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
so I believe I found the game i received the s- on but I am not sure how to get the match link
Click on your name to the top right corner of the website, you'll see a drop down menu. Click "Match History", find the match on the website, copy the URL and paste it here.
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA1/217948772 Is this what it is supposed to look like?
Yes, now you find the specific match, click on and paste that link.
where u level 5 when you got the S-?
